title: Bloody Games
description: Bailey was minding her own business... Never once in her entire life did she think she would be caught up in the bloody world of sex... Yet here she was... Levi was never one to shy from how he liked to play... Blood and sex... It's what got him off... And then there was Bailey... Bailey who changed the entire way he played the game that was for sure.WARNING: THIS BOOK IS RECOMMENDED FOR READERS 18 YEARS AND OVER. IT CONTAINS SEX, SUBMISSION, AND VIOLENCE.
author: E.L. Beth
